items.name: Conflux Pale Ale
items.desc: Conflux is our house Pale Ale, soft and tropical featuring flaked oats and a light touch of rye malt, liberally hopped with Citra and Azacca. 440ml / 4.8% ABV ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats, Rye) Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Dayspring Pilsner
items.desc: A dry, crisp and quenching lager, brewed with fine German Pilsner malt and generously hopped with citrussy Czech Kazbek. 440ml / 5.0% ABV ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley) Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: Nocturne Oatmeal Porter
items.desc: A full and silky Porter with liberal amounts of flaked oats and a complex blend of British and German roasted malts. 440ml / 5.0% ABV ALLERGENS: Gluten (Barley, Oats) Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly

items.name: This Must Be The Place Simcoe Pale Ale
items.desc: Simcoe takes centre stage in this single hopped pale ale, balanced with a big dose of rye malt to add complimentary spicy notes to Simcoeâ€™s big citrus and pine flavours. 440ml / 4.8% ABV Allergens: Gluten, Barley, Oats, Rye Vegan Friendly

items.name: Wowee Zowee West Coast IPA
items.desc: A crisp, bitter and resinous West Coast style IPA with Simcoe, Centennial and Mosaic hops, and a little homage to our favourite West Coast indie rock band. 440ml / 6.7% ABV ALLERGENS: Gluten, barley, wheat Unfiltered, unpasteurised - Vegan Friendly
